creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Sicilian linen scarf with multicolored embroidery Towel scarf, linen edged with embroidery in repeat floral pattern in shades of green, rose, yellow, apricot, blue and gold. Silk threads in short satin stitch, metal threads in long satin stitch. One edge selvage, three edges finely overcast. Yellow stains.
title: Scarf
